stencils.title: Diagram
stencils.description: A Diagram
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="800"    height="600"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <g pointer-events="fill" >     <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <rect id="diagramcanvas" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="790" height="590" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white" />      <text font-size="22" id="diagramtext" x="400" y="25" oryx:align="top center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Author
properties.description: This holds the name of the author of the Diagram.

properties.title: Language
properties.description: This holds the name of the language in which text is written.

properties.title: CreationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was created.

properties.title: ModificationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was last modified.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: The modeler may add optional text documentation about the Diagram.

stencils.title: Neues Dokument/Information erstellen
stencils.description: Ein neues Dokument/eine Information wird erstellt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Erfassen/Registrieren
stencils.description: Die Metadaten eines Dokuments/einer Information werden aufgenommen.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Erfassen/Registrieren
stencils.description: Ein bereits bestehendes Dokument/Information wird bearbeitet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Dokument archivieren
stencils.description: Verwendete Dokumente werden archiviert/abgelegt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Dokument/Information geht ein
stencils.description: Ein neues Dokument/eine Information wird erstellt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Dokument/Information weiterleiten
stencils.description: Ein Dokument/eine Information wird an eine andere Organisationseinheit innerhalb der Verwaltung weitergeleitet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Dokument/Information geht aus
stencils.description: Ein Dokument/eine Information wird zu einem Adressaten außerhalb der Organisation versendet (z.B. ein Bürger).
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Bearbeitungsunterbrechung
stencils.description: Die Bearbeitung eines Prozesses muss unterbrochen werden, wenn notwendige Informationen fehlen.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Dokument/Information sichten
stencils.description: Der Inhalt eines Dokuments/Information wird lediglich gesichtet und wahrgenommen.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Formelle Prüfung vornehmen
stencils.description: Unterlagen/ein Sachverhalt werden formell z.B. auf Vollständigkeit unhd Fristeinhaltung geprüft.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Inhaltliche Prüfung vornehmen
stencils.description: Unterlagen/ein Sachverhalt werden inhaltlich geprüft. Basierend auf Gesetzen, Verordnungen und Erfahrungen wird eine Entscheidung getroffen oder ein Vorschlag gemacht.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Berechnung durchführen
stencils.description: Dokumente/Informationen werden auf Basis von Vorschriften ausgewertet und komplexe/aufwendige Berechnungen dazu durchgeführt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Kassieren/Einzahlung entgegennehmen
stencils.description: Die konkrete Entgegennahme von Einzahlungen, NICHT die Antragstellung einer solchen wird abgebildet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Auszahlung durchführen
stencils.description: Die konkrete Auszahlung von bewilligten Zahlungen, NICHT die Antragstellung einer solchen wird abgebildet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Bearbeitungsort wechseln
stencils.description: Der Ort der Bearbeitung wird z.B. aufgrund einer Vor-Ort-Prüfung gewechselt. Bei Abschluss dieser und Rückkehr in die Organisationseinheit wird der Baustein erneut gewählt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Dateneingabe in die EDV
stencils.description: Daten werden manuell in ein EDV-System eingegeben.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Scannen
stencils.description: Ein papierbasiertes Dokument wird eingescannt und im EDV-System hinterlegt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Drucken
stencils.description: Ein elektronisches Dokument wird ausgedruckt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Datenträger bespielen
stencils.description: Daten werden auf eine CD/DVD, USB-Stick, Diskette oder Ähnliches gespeichert.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Dokument vervielvältigen/Kopieren
stencils.description: Dokument wird vervielvältigt, exakte Kopie wird angefertigt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Recherche durchführen
stencils.description: Die notwendigen Informationen werden recherchiert.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Rückfrage durchführen
stencils.description: Eine direkte Rückfrage mit einem Bürger/Unternehmen/Mitarbeiter wird durchgeführt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Absprache/Vereinbarung treffen
stencils.description: Inhaltliche Abstimmungen und Terminabsprachen und Ähnliches werden getroffen.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Beratung durchführen
stencils.description: Intensiver Informationsaustausch zwischen Mitarbeiter und Kunden oder anderen Mitarbeitern.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Prozess
stencils.description: Äußere Struktur für einen ausführbaren Prozess.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="600"    height="250"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="124" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="299" oryx:cy="249" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="599" oryx:cy="124" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="299" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="299" oryx:cy="124" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="painted" >      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="0%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="20%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>         <rect id="border" class="stripable-element-force" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="600" height="250" fill="none" stroke-width="9" stroke="white" visibility="hidden"/>     <rect id="c" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="600" height="250" stroke="black" fill="none" />       <rect    id="caption"   oryx:anchors="left top bottom"   x="0"   y="0"   width="30"   height="250"   stroke="black"   stroke-width="1"   fill="white"  />    <rect    id="captionDisableAntialiasing"   oryx:anchors="left top bottom"   x="0"   y="0"   width="30"   height="250"   stroke="black"   stroke-width="1"   fill="url(#background) white"  />       <text x="10" y="125" font-size="14" id="text_name" oryx:fittoelem="caption" oryx:align="middle center" oryx:anchors="left" oryx:rotate="270" fill="black" stroke="black"></text>    <g id="multiInstance">   <path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="black" d="M296 240 v8 M300 240 v8 M304 240 v8" stroke-width="2" />  </g>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Teilprozess
stencils.description: Ausführungsumgebung für einen Teilprozess.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="600"    height="250"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <g pointer-events="painted" >         <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="0%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="20%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>      <rect id="border_invisible" class="stripable-element-force" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="600" height="250" fill="none" stroke-width="10" stroke="white" visibility="hidden"/>  <rect id="border" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="600" height="250" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />    <rect    id="caption"   oryx:anchors="left top bottom"   x="0"   y="1"   width="30"   height="248"   stroke="black"   stroke-width="0"   fill="white"   visibility="hidden"   class="stripable-element-force"  />    <path          style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1"          d="M 0,0 L 0,250"          oryx:anchors="left top bottom"          id="captionDisableAntialiasing" />    <!--rect    id="captionDisableAntialiasing"   oryx:anchors="left top bottom"   x="0"   y="0"   width="30"   height="250"   stroke="black"   stroke-width="1"   fill="url(#background) white"  /-->       <text    x="13"   y="125"    oryx:rotate="270"    font-size="14"    id="text_name"    oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:anchors="left"   oryx:fittoelem="caption"   fill="black"    stroke="black">  </text>   </g> </svg>
